pages.text: Do not play the natural aura dead end.
Then read the Nature Aura guide book is all.

Aura and energy conversion machine, used to convert aura and energy, right-click the controller in JEI to view the multi-cube structure diagram. If you have enough building cubes on your body, use the wooden stick to right-click the controller to quickly build.

Putting in an iron ingot will activate the inefficient energy to aura conversion mode, putting in a diamond will activate the aggressive energy to aura conversion mode, putting in a gold ingot will activate the inefficient aura to energy conversion mode, and putting in an emerald will activate the aggressive aura to energy conversion mode.
